GradientLegend¶

class pyqtgraph.GradientLegend(size, offset)[source]¶

Draws a color gradient rectangle along with text labels denoting the value at specific points along the gradient.

__init__(size, offset)[source]¶

Arguments:

bounds

QRectF with coordinates relative to view box. The default is QRectF(0,0,1,1), which means the item will have the same bounds as the view.
paint(self, painter: PySide2.QtGui.QPainter, option: PySide2.QtWidgets.QStyleOptionGraphicsItem, widget: typing.Union[PySide2.QtWidgets.QWidget, NoneType] = None)[source]¶
setLabels(l)[source]¶

Defines labels to appear next to the color scale. Accepts a dict of {text: value} pairs
